token-tooltip-alt.settings.FONT_SIZE.hin: Customize the tooltip's font size between 1 and 2.5 rem.
token-tooltip-alt.settings.MAX_ROWS.name: Max rows
token-tooltip-alt.settings.DATA_SOURCE.h: This is an advanced feature, please don't change it if you don't know what you are doing. This will determine from where the tooltip data is pulled.
token-tooltip-alt.settings.DARK_THEME.hi: Apply a dark theme for the tooltip.
token-tooltip-alt.settings.SHOW_ALL_ON_A: Display a tooltip for every visible token on the scene.
token-tooltip-alt.settings.SHOW_TOOLTIP_: Display a tooltips for every token on the scene. Dose nothing if 'Show on <ALT>' is set to false.
Display some useful debug information in the console.
